CustomField.description: Ticket13862: PSRO Age is calculated from creation date: Open: to "Today" Closed: to date of PSRO closure as "Completed" for Demo/FoC OR to date of "Date PO Received or Cost Written-off date" for RO/Trial Blank for "Cancelled"
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(PSR_Date_PO_Received_Or_Cost_Written_off__c), IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'Preparation'), ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'Submitted For Approval'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'In Execution') ), NOW()-CreatedDate, PSR_Date_Opportunity_Closed__c - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), PSR_Date_PO_Received_Or_Cost_Written_off__c - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: PSRO Age is calculated from creation date: Open: to "Today" Closed: to date of PSRO closure as "Completed" for Demo/FoC OR to date of "Date PO Received or Cost Written-off date" for RO/Trial Blank for "Cancelled"
CustomField.label: PSRO Age
